ccg-setinfo.name: Energized
ccg-setinfo.game: Star Trek Collectible Card Game: Second Edition

card.name: A Klingon Matter
card.text: Unless you have 2 Intelligence and Treachery or 2 Leadership and Cunning>32, randomly select a personnel. If that personnel has Strength<7, he or she is killed, then all your other personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile

card.name: Casualties of War
card.text: Randomly select three personnel. If the total cost of those personnel is 4 or less, they are killed. Otherwise, randomly select one of those personnel to be killed.

card.name: Crippling Attack
card.text: Unless you have 2 Leadership and Officer or 2 Navigation and Shields>6, randomly select a personnel to be killed, then this dilemma is placed on your ship. Damage - This ship is attributes-2.

card.name: Dedication to Duty
card.text: Randomly select a personnel. Unless you choose to kill that personnel, your opponent draws a number of cards equal to the number of [SD] icons on that personnel.

card.name: Disgraceful Assault
card.text: Unless you have 2 Security and Transporters, randomly select a personnel to be stopped. Unless you have Biology and 2 Medical, that personnel is killed instead, then all your personnel are stopped.

card.name: Disruptor Accident
card.text: Randomly select a personnel. Unless you choose to kill that personnel, he or she and a second randomly selected personnel are stopped.

card.name: DNA Security Scan
card.text: Unless you have Engineer and 2 Programming or 2 Security and Cunning>36, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

card.name: Exposed Power Relay
card.text: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped. If you still have nine personnel remaining, that personnel is killed instead, then randomly select a second personnel to be killed. If you still have ten personnel remaining, your opponent chooses a third personn

card.name: Face to Face
card.text: Your opponent names a skill. Randomly select two personnel. Each of those personnel that has that skill is killed.

card.name: Flim-Flam Artist
card.text: Unless you have Diplomacy and 2 Programming or Law and Cunning>32, all your personnel are stopped, your opponent may draw a card, and this dilemma is returned to its owner's dilemma pile.

card.name: Head to Head
card.text: Your opponent names a skill. Randomly select two personnel. Each of those personnel that has that skill is killed.

card.name: Hired Muscle
card.text: Unless you have 2 Acquisition or choose to discard three cards from hand, your opponent chooses a {na} personnel to be placed on top of his owner's deck.

card.name: Houdini Mines
card.text: Unless you have 2 Engineer and 2 Science or 2 Programming and 3 Security, randomly select a personnel to be killed, then this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

card.name: Meaningless Words
card.text: Unless you choose to discard the top three cards of your deck, your opponent chooses a personnel to be stopped.

card.name: Memory Invasion
card.text: Your opponent examines your hand and chooses a card. Unless you choose to discard that card, randomly select three personnel to be stopped.

card.name: Nausicaan Pirates
card.text: Unless you have Leadership and 2 Security or 2 Treachery and Strength>35, randomly select a personnel to be killed, then all your other personnel are stopped.

card.name: Picking Up the Pieces
card.text: Unless you have Geology or Programming, all your personnel are stopped. If you have two or more personnel who have Geology or Programming, randomly select all but one of those personnel to be stopped.

card.name: Plasma Shock
card.text: Randomly select a personnel. If that personnel has Strength>8, he or she is stopped. Otherwise, he or she is killed.

card.name: Quaint Technology
card.text: Unless you have 2 Anthropology and Programming or 2 Diplomacy and Cunning>34, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

card.name: Racial Tension
card.text: Randomly select two personnel. Unless they are the same species, both are stopped.

card.name: Sorting Things Out
card.text: If a personnel has been killed during this mission attempt, randomly select a personnel to be stopped.

card.name: Stolen Computer Core
card.text: Unless you have Intelligence and Transporters or 2 Security and Cunning>34, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma is placed on your ship. Damage - While a Programming personnel is aboard this ship, his or her owners must discard a card from hand

card.name: Subspace Accident
card.text: Unless you have Astrometrics and 2 Navigation or 2 Physics and Science, randomly select a personnel to be placed on the bottom of his or her owner's deck.

card.name: Telepathic Deception
card.text: Unless you have Biology, Exobiology, and Security or Telepathy and Cunning>28, all your personnel are stopped and this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

card.name: Timescape
card.text: Place this dilemma on this mission. You cannot begin a mission attempt at this mission. At the end of this turn, this dilemma returns to its owner's dilemma pile.

card.name: Training Accident
card.text: Randomly select three personnel. If the total cost of those personnel is 4 or less, they are killed. Otherwise, randomly select one of those personnel to be killed.

card.name: Traitor Exposed
card.text: Randomly select a Treachery personnel. If that personnel has Cunning>6, he or she is stopped. Otherwise, he or she is killed.

card.name: Unexpected
card.text: Randomly select a personnel to be stopped. Unless you have Astrometrics and 2 Diplomacy or Exobiology and 2 Medical, place that personnel on top of his or her owner's deck instead.

card.name: Bat'leth
card.text: Hand Weapon. When you win combat involving your Klingon present, the loser discards a random card from hand.

card.name: Ak'voh
card.text: Plays in your core. When a dilemma kills a personnel, his or her owner discards a card from hand.

card.name: Assassination Plot
card.text: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event and return your Assassin to his or her owner's hand to randomly kill an opponent's personnel present with that Assassin.

card.name: Born for Conquest
card.text: Assault. Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat involving your {kli} Officer personnel. If you win, score 10 points and randomly kill an opponent's personnel involved.

card.name: Brief Reunion
card.text: To play this event, you must command Cardassia Prime. Download a unique {car} personnel, then place him or her on your Cardassia Prime. At the end of this turn, kill that personnel. Destroy this event.

card.name: Cargo Run
card.text: Plays on your space mission. Add Acquisition to this mission's requirements. When you complete this mission, score 5 points.

card.name: Common Ground
card.text: To play this event, you must command three {TNG} personnel. Starting with the player to your left, each player may place a personnel from hand on a headquarters where that personnel could be played. (Yours must be a {TNG} personnel.) Destroy this event.

card.name: Complications
card.text: Plays in your core. When the player on your right begins a mission attempt, you may destroy this event to draw three extra dilemmas and spend three extra in total cost on dilemmas.

card.name: Confessions in the Pale Moonlight
card.text: Plays in your core. While your {fed}{DS9} Treachery personnel is attempting a mission, you may destroy this event to make him or her gain a skill of your choice until the end of this turn.

card.name: Conscription
card.text: Download two Glinns, then place them on top of your deck in any order. Destroy this event.

card.name: Crowd Control
card.text: Plays in your core. When a player is about to play a personnel who costs 1, if that player has played exactly one other personnel who costs 1 during this turn, that personnel is cost +2.

card.name: Deep Roots
card.text: Plays in your core. When you play a Bajoran Resistance personnel, you may destroy this event to destroy an event.

card.name: Disable Sensors
card.text: Maneuver. Plays in your core. Order - Begin an engagement involving your Leadership personnel. If you win, place this event on an opponent's ship involved. Otherwise, destroy this event. Damage - Personnel aboard this ship cannot attempt missions.

card.name: Ferocity
card.text: Assault. Maneuver. Plays in your core. When you win combat or an engagement involving your {kli} personnel, you may destroy this event to randomly kill an opponent's personnel involved.

card.name: For the Cause
card.text: Plays on Athos IV. You may attempt and complete Region: Demilitarized Zone missions using your {Maq} personnel (and a ship they are aboard at a space mission), regardless of effects preventing {Maq} personnel (or ships those personnel are aboard) from doi

card.name: For The Sisko
card.text: Prophet. Plays in your core. Order - If you command three {baj} personnel, discard a non-personnel card from hand to place two {baj} personnel from your discard pile on top of your deck in any order.

card.name: Heart of Glory
card.text: Assault. Maneuver. Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat or an engagement involving your {kli} personnel. If you win, randomly kill two opponent's personnel involved.

card.name: Kotra
card.text: To play this event, you must command three {car} personnel. Plays in your core. When an opponent discards a personnel from the top of his or her deck during your turn, score 5 points. You may do this only once each turn.

card.name: Legal Proceedings
card.text: Plays on your planet mission. Add Law to this mission's requirements. When you complete this mission, score 5 points.

card.name: Life Support
card.text: Take a personnel from your discard pile and place him or her on your headquarters mission where he or she could be played. At the end of this turn, remove that personnel from the game. Destroy this event.

card.name: Machinations
card.text: Temporal. Plays in your core. When you have drawn dilemmas, you may remove this event and those dilemmas from the game to search your dilemma pile and choose a dilemma for your opponent's personnel to face that costs no more than the number of dilemmas yo

card.name: Mental Discipline
card.text: Plays in your core. When you unique personnel is facing a dilemma, you may discard a personnel with the same card title from hand to make him or her attributes +1 and gain one of the discarded personnel's skills until the end of that dilemma.

card.name: Peldor Joi
card.text: To play this event, you must command three {baj} personnel. Take a {baj} personnel from your discard pile and place him or her on you headquarters mission where that personnel could be played. Each of your opponents may take a personnel from his or her di

card.name: Personal Forcefield
card.text: Name a unique personnel you command. For the rest of this turn, when he or she is about to be killed by a dilemma, prevent that. Destroy this event.

card.name: Picking Up the Basics
card.text: Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event and stop one of your {TNG} personnel to make one of your other {TNG} personnel present gain all of that stopped personnel's skills until the end of this turn.

card.name: Pickpocket
card.text: Crime. To play this event, you must command a Thief. Plays in your core. Order - Reveal the top card of an opponent's deck. If it is not a personnel, destroy this event. Otherwise, each of your Thieves is attributes +2 until the end of this turn. You may

card.name: Political Leverage
card.text: Capture. Choose an opponent's personnel aboard a ship at the same mission as your staffed {car} ship. Place that personnel in your brig. That opponent may discard the top four cards of his or her deck to prevent this. Destroy this event.

card.name: Power to the Weapons
card.text: Maneuver. Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin an engagement involving your Leadership personnel. If you win, randomly kill two opponent's personnel involved.

card.name: Rash Aggression
card.text: Assault. Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin combat involving your {baj} Treachery personnel. If you win, choose an opponent's personnel involved to be killed.

card.name: Reconfiguration
card.text: To play this event, you must command two Engineer personnel. Shuffle any player's deck to draw a card. Destroy this event.

card.name: Retaliation
card.text: Capture. Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event and stop your three {Maq} personnel present together at a non-headquarters mission to place an opponent's personnel present in your brig.

card.name: Salvaging the Wreckage
card.text: Take up to four personnel and ship cards from your discard pile and place them on the bottom of your deck in any order. Remove this event from the game.

card.name: Shadow Operation
card.text: To play this event, you must command two {rom} Intelligence personnel. Plays in your core. When you are about to play a {rom} personnel who costs 3, if you have played no other personnel this turn and your staffed ship is at an opponent's non-headquarters

card.name: Sickbay
card.text: To play this event, you must command a Medical personnel. Plays in your core. At the end of your turn, destroy this event. When your personnel is about to be killed by a dilemma, if you command a ship at the same mission, place that personnel on top of hi

card.name: Smuggling Run
card.text: Crime. Plays in your core. At the start of each of your turns, if your Smuggler is at an opponent's non-headquarters mission, that opponent has no ship at that mission, and your personnel at that mission have its requirements, you may destroy this event t

card.name: Staunch Determination
card.text: Maneuver. Plays in your core. When an opponent's personnel is killed in an engagement involving your {car} ship, you may destroy this event to make that opponent discard a number of cards from the top of his or her deck equal to that personnel's cost.

card.name: Straying from the Path
card.text: Prophet. To play this event, you must command three {baj} personnel. If you have fewer cards in your discard pile than in your hand, exchange your discard pile with your hand. Remove this event from the game.

card.name: Temba, His Arms Wide
card.text: To play this event, you must command three {TNG} personnel. Plays in your core. When you are about to play a personnel, you may give command of this event to the player on your right to make that personnel cost -3 (move this event to his or her core).

card.name: The Text of the Kosst Amojan
card.text: Pah-wraith. Plays in your core. Order - Stop your Kai or one of your {baj} Treachery personnel to choose two non-Prophet cards from your discard pile. Choose an opponent to choose one of those cards to place in your hand and one to remove from the game. Y

card.name: Under Scrutiny
card.text: Plays in your core. When you play this event, name a personnel. While that personnel is attempting a mission, his or her owner must discard a card from hand to use his or her sk

card.name: Unexpected Difficulties
card.text: Plays in your core. When you have drawn dilemmas, you may destroy this event to return them to your dilemma pile and draw an equal number of dilemmas.

card.name: Unseen Manipulations
card.text: To play this event, you must command three {rom} Treachery personnel. Plays in your core. When an opponent begins the Execute Orders segment of his or her turn, if that opponent has not drawn two cards or played a ship this turn, he or she discards the to

card.name: Vast Resources
card.text: To play this event, you must command three {car} personnel. Kill your captive to draw a number of cards equal to that captive's cost. Destroy this event.

card.name: Visionary
card.text: Temporal. To play this event, you must command two {DS9} Engineer personnel. Plays in your core. When you draw a card, you may discard that card to draw a card. You may do this only once each turn.

card.name: We Will Not Surrender
card.text: Maneuver. Plays in your core. Order - Destroy this event to begin an engagement involving your {kli} Officer personnel. If you win, score 10 points and randomly kill and opponent's personnel involved.

card.name: Bank Heist
card.text: Crime. When your Thief is facing a dilemma, choose an opponent to reveal the top three cards of his or her deck. That Thief gains one skill from each personnel revealed until the end of that dilemma. Replace those cards in the same order.

card.name: Coordinated Attack
card.text: To play this interrupt, you must command three {kli} Officer personnel. Order - Download an Assault and Maneuver card.

card.name: Diplomatic Masquerade
card.text: When your {rom} Diplomacy personnel is facing a dilemma, reveal the top card of an opponent’s deck. If it is a personnel, that {rom} personnel gains the revealed personnel’s skills until the end of this dilemma.

card.name: Discreet Inquiry
card.text: When your {fed}{DS9} personnel is attempting a mission, reveal a personnel from hand to make him or her gain one of the revealed personnel’s skills until the end of that mission attempt. Place the revealed personnel on top of your deck.

card.name: Emergency Treatment
card.text: When your unique personnel is about to be killed by a dilemma, if your Medical personnel is present, that unique personnel is stopped instead. That dilemma’s owner may draw three cards.

card.name: Fresh Tactic
card.text: To play this interrupt, you must command three Guls. Order - Download a Capture or Punishment card.

card.name: Honorable Death
card.text: To play this interrupt, you must command a unique {kli} personnel present with an opponent’s personnel. Order - Kill that {kli} personnel to destroy an opponent's event.

card.name: If Wishes Were Horses
card.text: Order - Discard a card from hand to download an event, then discard a random card from hand.

card.name: Ja'chuq
card.text: When you win combat or an engagement involving your {kli} Leadership personnel, choose one of your missions. The player to your left places the top card of his or her dilemma pile face up beneath that mission (that dilemma is overcome). Remove this interr

card.name: Powerful Example
card.text: To play this interrupt, you must command three {TNG} personnel. Order - Destroy your event to make each of your opponents destroy an event he or she commands.

card.name: Precautionary Measures
card.text: When your {DS9} personnel is about to be stopped by a dilemma, stop one of your {E} personnel present to prevent that.

card.name: Relentless
card.text: When your Honor Klingon is about to be stopped by a dilemma, discard an interrupt from hand to prevent that.

card.name: Shared Delicacy
card.text: Punishment. To play this interrupt, you must command three Guls and have a captive. Order - Reveal a random card from that captive's owner's hand. He or she chooses to discard that card or discard the top three cards of his or her deck.

card.name: Stricken Dumb
card.text: When your personnel is facing a dilemma, discard a card from hand to make that personnel lose all his or her skills until the end of that dilemma.

card.name: Team of Ambassadors
card.text: When your Diplomacy personnel is facing a dilemma, meet Cunning and Strength requirements of that dilemma using Integrity instead.

card.name: The Prophets' Guidance
card.text: Prophet. To play this interrupt, you must command two Vedeks. Order - Take a {baj} personnel from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: The Truth of War
card.text: Assault. When you win combat, the loser discards the top two cards of his or her deck.

card.name: Vile of Deception
card.text: When an opponent’s personnel is attempting a mission, if your Romulan is at that mission, that opponent chooses to reveal his or her hand and discard all interrupts revealed or chooses two of his or her personnel involved in that mission attempt to be sto

card.name: Vision of Violence
card.text: Prophet. When your {baj} personnel is in combat, add the Strength of a {baj} personnel in your discard pile to your total Strength.

card.name: We Are Klingon
card.text: When your {kli} personnel is attempting a mission, he or she is Strength +1 until the end of that mission attempt (or +3 if you command Kahless).

card.name: Well-Crafted Lure
card.text: Capture. To play this interrupt, you must command a {car} Law personnel at a non-headquarters mission. Order - Randomly select an opponent’s non-unique personnel present. You may discard a number of cards from hand equal to that personnel’s cost to place

card.name: Aid Clone Colony
card.text: Biology, Diplomacy, 2 Medical, and Cunning>36 When you complete this mission, you may download a copy of a personnel you command.

card.name: Athos IV (Maquis Base)
card.text: You may play {Maq} cards, {na} cards, {fed} Treachery personnel, and equipment at this mission. Region: Badlands. Order - Discard a card from hand to download For the Cause.

card.name: Avert Danger
card.text: Astrometrics, Physics, Science, and Cunning>32 When you complete this mission, if your personnel completing it have 2 Physics or 2 Science, score 5 points.

card.name: Brute Force
card.text: 2 Leadership, 3 Security, and Strength>38 When you complete this mission, if each of your personnel at this mission is a {kli} personnel, score 5 points.

card.name: Cargo Haul
card.text: Acquisition, Medical, and Cunning>44 You cannot move your ship from this mission to a headquarters mission. When you move your ship with your Acquisition personnel aboard it to this mission, if you have not completed this mission, you may stop that person

card.name: Investigate Maquis Activity
card.text: Diplomacy, 2 Leadership, and Integrity>27 Region: Demilitarized Zone. You cannot complete this mission if your {Maq} personnel is on this planet. When you complete this mission, if you have completed no other missions, score 5 points.

card.name: Mine Nebula
card.text: Engineer, 2 Navigation, Officer, and Cunning>31 Nebula. When you complete this mission, if you command three {baj} personnel, score 5 points.

card.name: Treat Plague Ship
card.text: Biology, Medical, and Cunning>26 When you complete this mission, place one of your Medical personnel at this mission in your discard pile.

card.name: Akorem Laan (Revered Poet)
card.text: {SD}Anthropology {SD}Law {SD}Navigation {SD}Physics When two {baj} personnel are in your discard pile, this personnel is attributes +2.

card.name: Borum (Selfless Hero)
card.text: {SD}Exobiology {SD}Honor {SD}Medical Bajoran Resistance. Order - Exchange this personnel with a {baj} Leadership personnel in your discard pile, then remove this personnel from the game.

card.name: Jaro Essa (Leader of the Circle)
card.text: {SD}Diplomacy {SD}Law {SD}Leadership {SD}Treachery When this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may remove a personnel in your discard pile from the game to make him gain one of the removed personnel's skills until the end of that dilemma. You may do this only once e

card.name: Kira Nerys (Impassioned Major)
card.text: {SD}Honor {SD}Leadership {SD}Officer {SD}Security Bajoran Resistance. When this personnel uses a skill to complete a mission, you may take one of your personnel from an opponent's brig or from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: Kurn (Bajoran Security Officer)
card.text: {SD}Law {SD}Navigation {SD}Officer {SD}Security When you win combat involving this personnel, you may return him to his owner's hand to kill an opponent's personnel involved.

card.name: Leeta (Dabo Girl)
card.text: {SD}Anthropology {SD}Honor Dabo Girl. When this personnel is randomly selected during a mission attempt, you may make one of your other {baj} personnel present gain one skill he or she already has until the end of that mission attempt.

card.name: Ro Laren (Maquis Sympathizer)
card.text: {SD}Leadership {SD}Navigation {SD}Programming {SD}Security {SD}Treachery When this personnel uses a skill to complete a mission, you may choose an opponent to place two random cards from hand on top of his or her deck.

card.name: The Sirah (The Storyteller)
card.text: {SD}Anthropology {SD}2 Honor {SD}Leadership While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may stop him to make each of your other {baj} personnel present attributes +3 until the end of that dilemma.

card.name: Varis Sul (Tetrarch of the Paqu)
card.text: {SD}Geology {SD}Honor {SD}Law While a {baj} Leadership personnel is in your discard pile, this personnel gains Diplomacy and Leadership.

card.name: Winn Adami (Devious Manipulator)
card.text: {SD}Diplomacy {SD}Leadership {SD}Treachery Vedek. When you play this personnel, you may download a Treachery Bajoran.

card.name: Boheeka (Clandestine Connection)
card.text: {SD}Biology {SD}Engineer {SD}Officer {SD}Physics Glinn. Smuggler. When you play this personnel, you may discard any number of cards from hand, then draw an equal number of cards.

card.name: Enabran Tain (Retired Mastermind)
card.text: {SD}2 Intelligence {SD}Programming {SD}Security {SD}2 Treachery When this personnel is about to be stopped, you may kill one of your other {car} personnel present to prevent that.

card.name: Evek (Harsh Interrogator)
card.text: {SD}Diplomacy {SD}Leadership {SD}Officer {SD}Security Commander: Vetar. Gul. While you have a captive, this personnel gains Biology and Law.

card.name: Jural
card.text: {SD}Geology {SD}Science {SD}Transporters Glinn. While this personnel is present with a Gul, he gains Physics.

card.name: Natima Lang (Professor of Political Ethics)
card.text: {SD}Diplomacy {SD}Honor {SD}Law {SD}Leadership {SD}Programming Dissident. When you play this personnel, discard a card from hand.

card.name: Benjamin Sisko (Man of Resolve)
card.text: {SD}Diplomacy {SD}Engineer {SD}Leadership {SD}Officer {SD}Security Order - This personnel loses Diplomacy and gains Treachery until the end of this turn. You may do this only once each turn.

card.name: Cal Hudson (Attaché to the Demilitarized Zone)
card.text: {SD}Diplomacy {SD}Leadership {SD}Navigation {SD}Officer {SD}Treachery When you play this personnel, you may download a {Maq} ship.

card.name: Chakotay (Freedom Fighter)
card.text: {SD}Anthropology {SD}Archaeology {SD}Leadership {SD}Navigation {SD}Treachery Commander: Valjean. While this personnl is facing a dilemma, each of your other {Maq} personnel present is attributes +1.

card.name: Ezri Dax (Station Counselor)
card.text: {SD}Anthropology {SD}Diplomacy {SD}Geology Host. If you command Jadzia Dax, place this personnel in her owner's discard pile. While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may discard a card from hand to make her gain Engineer, Law, or Science until the end of tha

card.name: Jake Sisko (Temporal Anchor)
card.text: {SD}Anthropology {SD}Astrometrics {SD}Biology {SD}Physics {SD}Programming {SD}Science Order - Place this personnel in his owner's discard pile to download a {fed}{DS9} personnel.

card.name: Joseph Sisko (Creole Chef)
card.text: {SD}Anthropology {SD}Biology {SD}Honor Each of your {fed}{DS9} personnel present is attributes +1.

card.name: Julian Bashir ('Unnatural Freak')
card.text: {SD}Biology {SD}Exobiology {SD}3 Medical Genetically Enhanced. While this personnel is attempting a mission, you may remove two cards in your discard pile from the game to make him gain Treachery until the end of this turn. You may do this only once each turn.

card.name: Keiko O'Brien (School Teacher)
card.text: {SD}Biology {SD}Exobiology {SD}Honor {SD}Science When you are about to play a {baj} personnel at this mission, you may discard a card from hand to make that personnel cost -1.

card.name: Kelly (Relief Tactical Officer)
card.text: {SD}Engineer {SD}Physics {SD}Security Genetically Enhanced.

card.name: Michael Eddington (Noble Hero)
card.text: {SD}Engineer {SD}Leadership {SD}Security {SD}Treachery Commander: Guingouin. While an opponent's ship is in an engagement at this mission, that opponent cannot play interrupts.

card.name: Miles O'Brien (Transporter Chief)
card.text: {SD}Engineer {SD}Honor {SD}Navigation {SD}2 Transporters While this personnel is equipped with an equipment, he gains Physics and Programming.

card.name: Niles
card.text: {SD}Navigation {SD}Security {SD}Transporters {SD}Treachery When you play this personnel, you may download Retaliation.

card.name: Rebecca Sullivan (Resistance Fighter)
card.text: {SD}Biology {SD}Honor {SD}Medical {SD}Science Order - Take a {Maq} personnel from your discard pile and place him or her on the bottom of your deck. You may do this only once each turn.

card.name: Thomas Riker (Defiant Leader)
card.text: {SD}Geology {SD}Leadership {SD}Officer {SD}Security {SD}Treachery Commander: U.S.S. Defiant. While this personnel is aboard your {fed} ship, it is Range +2.

card.name: William Patrick Samuels (Maquis Saboteur)
card.text: {SD}Astrometrics {SD}Engineer {SD}Treachery Order - If this personnel is on a planet mission, stop him to place a Damage card from hand on an opponent's undamaged ship at this mission.

card.name: Bregath
card.text: {SD}Archaeology {SD}Engineer {SD}Security {SD}Treachery While an opponent commands a ship that has a Damage card on it, this personnel is attributes +2.

card.name: Divok
card.text: {SD}Biology {SD}Honor {SD}Medical {SD}Physics When you play this personnel, if you command Kahless, you may draw a card.

card.name: Drex (Arrogant Warrior)
card.text: {SD}Astrometrics {SD}Officer {SD}Security Order - Return this personnel to his owner's hand to kill an opponent's personnel present who costs 2 or less.

card.name: K'mpec (Klingon Supreme Commander)
card.text: {SD}2 Leadership {SD}Officer {SD}Security Chancellor. Commander: I.K.S. Qam-Chee. When you play an Honor Klingon at this mission, you may place a card from hand on the bottom of your deck to draw a card. You may do this only once each turn.

card.name: Kahless (The Greatest Warrior of Them All)
card.text: {SD}Anthropology {SD}2 Honor {SD}3 Leadership While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may meet Integrity and Cunning requirements of that dilemma using Strength instead.

card.name: Kahless (The Unforgettable)
card.text: {SD}2 Honor {SD}3 Leadership When you kill an opponent's personnel in combat or an engagement, if you command a {kli} ship, you may place a {kli} personnel who costs 3 or less from hand aboard that ship.

card.name: Kargan (Rash Captain)
card.text: {SD}Leadership {SD}Officer {SD}Programming Commander: I.K.S. Pagh. When you play this personnel, you may download a Maneuver card.

card.name: Khar
card.text: {SD}Exobiology {SD}Honor {SD}Officer {SD}Security When you play this personnel, if you command Kahless, this personnel's cost is -1.

card.name: Khos
card.text: {SD}Biology {SD}Medical {SD}Navigation {SD}Officer When an opponent's personnel is killed, this personnel is attributes +2 until the end of this turn (limit +4).

card.name: Konmel (Renegade Warrior)
card.text: {SD}Astrometrics {SD}Honor {SD}Navigation {SD}Officer When your other Klingon present is killed during a mission attempt, this personnel may gain one of his or her skills until the end of that mission attempt. You may do this only once each turn.

card.name: Koral (Dour Smuggler)
card.text: {SD}Archaeology {SD}Astrometrics {SD}Navigation {SD}Treachery Smuggler. When you play this personnel, he is attributes +2 until the end of this turn.

card.name: Korris (Renegade Captain)
card.text: {SD}Engineer {SD}Honor {SD}Officer {SD}Security When your other Klingon present is killed during a mission attempt, this personnel is Strength +3 until the end of that mission attempt (limit +3).

card.name: Losta
card.text: {SD}Geology {SD}Navigation {SD}Officer While you command Kahless, this personnel is attributes +2.

card.name: M'vil
card.text: {SD}Archaeology {SD}Astrometrics {SD}Biology {SD}Medical When you play this personnel, you may destroy an opponent's event. That opponent may place two cards from hand on top of his or her deck in any order to prevent this.

card.name: Amaros (Earnest Vanguard)
card.text: {SD}Engineer {SD}Leadership {SD}Navigation {SD}Physics {SD}Treachery When an engagement involving your {Maq} ship begins at this mission, if this personnel is aboard a {Maq} ship, that ship may join that engagement.

card.name: Arctus Baran (Mercenary Captain)
card.text: {SD}Archaeology {SD}Biology {SD}Officer {SD}Treachery Commander: Fortune. Smuggler. Thief. While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may discard a card from hand to download Shady Resources.

card.name: Harana
card.text: {SD}Anthropology {SD}Geology {SD}Medical {SD}Physics When this personnel is killed by a dilemma, in combat, or in an engagement, you may destroy a non-Maneuver event.

card.name: Jaglom Shrek
card.text: {SD}Navigation {SD}Physics {SD}Transporters When you play this personnel, you may examine the top card of any player's deck.

card.name: Kobb
card.text: {SD}Diplomacy {SD}Law {SD}Science When you play this personnel at Athos IV, choose an opponent to place a card from hand on top of his or her deck.

card.name: Liam Bilby (Family Man)
card.text: {SD}Geology {SD}Leadership {SD}Treachery Thief. While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may place a card from hand on top of your deck to download Bank Heist.

card.name: Macius
card.text: {SD}Exobiology {SD}Leadership {SD}Medical Order - Place this personnel in your discard pile to take a {Maq} personnel or For the Cause from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: Maques (Cairn Delegate)
card.text: {SD}Diplomacy {SD}Honor {SD}2 Telepathy

card.name: Narik
card.text: {SD}Engineer {SD}Physics {SD}Programming Smuggler.

card.name: Raimus (Criminal Master)
card.text: {SD}Acquisition {SD}Engineer {SD}Leadership {SD}2 Treachery Thief. Order - Place a card from hand on top of your deck to download a Crime card. You may do this only once each turn.

card.name: Roga Danar (Decorated Subhadar)
card.text: {SD}Biology {SD}Engineer {SD}Leadership {SD}Navigation {SD}Programming {SD}Security Genetically Enhanced. When this personnel is about to be placed in a brig, place him on top of his owner's deck instead.

card.name: Sakonna (Gunrunner)
card.text: {SD}Acquisition {SD}Engineer {SD}Physics {SD}Treachery Smuggler. Order - This personnel gains one skill from one of your captives. She keeps this skill until the start of your next turn. You may do this only once each turn.

card.name: Sark
card.text: {SD}Exobiology {SD}Science {SD}Transporters

card.name: Vekor
card.text: {SD}Medical {SD}Navigation {SD}Science Thief.

card.name: Galathon (Steadfast Rival)
card.text: {SD}Archaeology {SD}Geology {SD}Law {SD}Leadership {SD}Officer Commander: Trolarak. When you play this personnel, you make take Engage Cloak or a Pursuit card from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: Mirok (Interphase Researcher)
card.text: {SD}Engineer {SD}Physics {SD}Science {SD}Treachery When an opponent attempts this mission with an Engineer personnel, that opponent discards a card from hand.

card.name: Neral (Senate Proconsul)
card.text: {SD}Diplomacy {SD}Law {SD}Leadership {SD}Treachery Senator. While this personnel is facing a dilemma, you may discard a card from hand to download Diplomatic Masquerade.

card.name: Palteth
card.text: {SD}Astrometrics {SD}Engineer {SD}Navigation {SD}Officer {SD}Programming

card.name: Sirol (Diplomatic Adversary)
card.text: {SD}Astrometrics {SD}Diplomacy {SD}Leadership {SD}Navigation {SD}Officer {SD}Treachery Commander: Terix. While an opponent's Treachery personnel is at this mission, that opponent must discard a card from hand to use that Treachery.

card.name: T'Rul (Curt Subcommander)
card.text: {SD}Engineer {SD}Physics {SD}Programming {SD}Security Order - If this personnel is aboard a ship on your Engage Cloak, examine the top card of an opponent's deck.

card.name: Toraan
card.text: {SD}Intelligence {SD}Security {SD}Transporters When you play this personnel, choose an opponent to discard a card from hand.

card.name: Toreth (Cautious Commander)
card.text: {SD}Honor {SD}Leadership {SD}Navigation {SD}Officer Commander: Khazara. When this personnel uses a skill to complete a mission, you may examine an opponent's hand and choose one of those cards to be discarded. You may do this only once each turn.

card.name: Kitara
card.text: When an opponent beams to or from this mission, if it is a planet mission and this ship is staffed, you may take a card from your discard pile into hand.

card.name: Aldara
card.text: While you have a higher score than each of your opponents, each of your Cardassians aboard this ship is Cunning +1.

card.name: Guingouin
card.text: When you win an engagement you began involving this ship, if each ship you command is a {Maq} ship, score 10 points.

card.name: Maquis Raider
card.text: When you win an engagement involving this ship, the loser places one of his or her personnel involved on top of that personnel's owner's deck.

card.name: Valjean
card.text: Order - Reveal the top card of an opponent's deck. If it is not a personnel, place it on the bottom of its owner's deck to make this ship attributes +2 until the end of this turn. You may do this only once each turn.

card.name: I.K.S. Qam-Chee
card.text: Cloaking Device. While this ship is at an opponent's mission, if this ship is staffed, each of your opponent's personnel and ships at this mission is attributes -1.

card.name: Fortune
card.text: When you play this ship, you may download a {na} Archaeology personnel.

card.name: Tama
card.text: While this ship is at a planet mission, if this ship is staffed, an opponent must discard a card from hand to beam to or from this planet.

card.name: Khazara
card.text: Cloaking Device. Order - If this ship is on your Engage Cloak, examine an opponent's hand and choose one of those cards. That opponent exchanges that card with the top card of his or her deck. You may do this only once each turn.

card.name: Terix
card.text: Cloaking Device. While this ship is at an opponent's space mission, if this ship is staffed, that opponent must discard two cards from hand to attempt this mission.

card.name: Trolarak
card.text: Cloaking Device. While this ship is at an opponent's planet mission, if this ship is staffed, that opponent must discard two cards from hand to attempt this mission.
